file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 27-11-00-03 - AILERON PRIMARY MECHANICAL CONTROL - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AILERON PRIMARY MECHANICAL CONTROL - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to lubricate the control wheel chain. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CONTROL WHEEL CHAIN - LUBRICA- ALL 27-11-00-600-801-A ♦ TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 27-11-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-11-00-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CONTROL WHEEL CHAIN - LUBRICATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to lubricate the control wheel chain. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 27-36-03-000-801-A/400 STICK SHAKER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 27-36-03-400-801-A/400 STICK SHAKER - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Area below the cockpit floor - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Molykote DC-33 Grease light consistency AR Commercially available Tie-down strap AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Area below the cockpit floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the control rigging door 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the Stick Shaker (AMM TASK 27-36-03-000-801-A/400). (3) Cut the tie-down strap that fasten the wiring to the control column. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 27-11-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Displace the wiring from the control column. (5) Remove the control column boot and main cover (AMM 25-12-14-000-801-A). (6) Remove the upper cover (Figure 301). J. Lubricate Control Wheel Chain (Figure 301) SUBTASK 640-002-A (1) Move the right control wheel fully to the right. (2) Lubricate the sprocket and the control wheel chain in the control wheel (Figure 301). (3) Move the control wheel fully to the left. (4) Lubricate the sprocket and control wheel chain in the right control wheel (Figure 301). (5) Do steps 1 - 4 again for the left control wheel. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the control rigging door 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Install the upper cover (Figure 301). (3) Install the main cover and control column boot (AMM 25-12-14-400-801-A). (4) Place the wiring to the control column and fasten it with tie-down strap. (5) Install the Stick Shaker (AMM TASK 27-36-03-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 27-11-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
